Name: Cosmos - Escape From Freedom
About the game: Cosmos Is a game about surviving and upgrading your spacecraft to fight off bullet-hell bosses that have been released by the deadly Cosmic Dragon. What To Expect - Beautiful 32bit pixel art - Dynamic User Interface - 16 Unique Bosses scaling in 4 tiers of difficulty - 20+ Ship re-skins purchasable through In-game currency only - 5 Interstellar Cosmic Rift maps with varying difficulties - Dynamic sound for music/audio produced by DEFCAT - In-Game Rating system, with Rating emotes for those who have proven worthly - Class system with a progression towards new abilities and skins Whats To Come? - Weekly Content Updates - Each content update contains new Artifacts, Items Or Bosses - Rewards system for killing cosmic echos at higher difficulties - Boss skill reworking and fairness adjustments - Campaign mode with scaling difficulties Explore and Collect - 80+ Unique Artifacts with game changing abilities - Collection log with all your important stats and rewards gained while playing - Co-Pilot levels that increase your ships power and performance with each 5 levels - Exclusive animated Co-Pilot skins for those who reached Co-Pilot level 15!
